Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.print.BufferPrinter1_3
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.print.BufferPrinter1_4
    org.gjt.sp.util.TaskAdapter
    use TaskListener instead as it now has default methods
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.bsh.JavaCharStream.getColumn()  
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.bsh.JavaCharStream.getLine()  
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.bsh.NameSpace.setTypedVariable​(String, Class, Object, boolean)
    See #setTypedVariable( String, Class, Object, Modifiers )
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.jEdit._getBuffer​(String)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.jEdit.getBuffer​(String)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.jEdit.getBuffers()
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.jEdit.getViews()
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.Registers.Register.setValue​(String)
    use Registers.Register.setTransferable(java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable) instead, for example setTransferable(new StringSelection(""))
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.textarea.TextArea.getMarkPosition()
    Do not use.
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.textarea.TextAreaMouseHandler.isMiddleButton​(int)
    use TextAreaMouseHandler.isMiddleButton(MouseEvent)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.textarea.TextAreaMouseHandler.isRightButton​(int)
    use TextAreaMouseHandler.isRightButton(MouseEvent)
    org.gjt.sp.jedit.TextUtilities.join​(Collection<?>, String)
    use String.join(CharSequence, CharSequence...) or String.join(CharSequence, Iterable), thos methods are available since Java 8 and are faster in all situations
    org.gjt.sp.util.GenericGUIUtilities.isMiddleButton​(int)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.isMiddleButton(MouseEvent)
    org.gjt.sp.util.GenericGUIUtilities.isRightButton​(int)
    use GenericGUIUtilities.isRightButton(MouseEvent)
    org.gjt.sp.util.StringList.join​(Collection<String>, String)
    use String.join(CharSequence, CharSequence...) or String.join(CharSequence, Iterable), thos methods are available since Java 8 and are faster in all situations
